players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: " Who do you all think might be the mafioso? I have no clues myself."
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation last night."
You: "Bob is lying. I am a villager and I was investigating Bob last night. Bob is the mafioso."

You: "Diana, Bob is trying to frame me. He claimed he investigated me, but I was investigating him. As a villager, I found Bob to be the mafioso. He's trying to divert attention from himself by accusing me."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: " Who do you all think might be the mafioso? I have no clues myself."
You: "I think Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation last night."
Alice: "Bob is lying. I am a villager and I was investigating Bob last night. Bob is the mafioso."

Alice: "Diana, Bob is trying to frame me. He claimed he investigated me, but I was investigating him. As a villager, I found Bob to be the mafioso. He's trying to divert attention from himself by accusing me."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
